author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Check out Hollyland's Lark M2S at their website https://hollyland.info/4bCV0uG or on Amazon https://amzn.to/3ZVaowT  #Hollyland #HollylandMic #LARKM2S #MissionInvisible

This is a comment on a recent video by Matt O'Dowd https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GjkqedrTwZo 

I find it extremely distressing that we are still discussing this even though it's abundantly clear that naturalness arguments have historically worked extremely badly. It's a pseudo-scientific method that physicists need to stop using.

00:47 Naturalness
03:30 The Supposed Crisis
06:11 A Little Bit of History
07:49 Technical Naturalness
11:41 Past Successes?
12:53 The Confusion
18:36 In the End
20:30 Hollyland Mic Review

title: No, Matt, this is no crisis
